part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A hideous specimen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A pool of liquid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Plumes of noxious gas stick to the air. They crowd the lungs of wet-blooded creatures who can't extract the displaced oxygen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Bone bits are aerosolized into a thick coal fog. Light is lost inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Ribbons of emerald and neon lace streak through the crackling air and bloom in violent florets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Hot aerosol swells as it starts to dissipate into air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Machine-chilled water was depressurized to a freezing fog to hold the processes of life in suspension.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Even now the nimbus of vaporized acid is condensing, starting to settle on its colonized surfaces, starting to sink through their soft edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The nickel-dew sticks to the air and arrests the transient molecules of migrant-matter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Miasma settles the lungs of its neighbors and guides them to the dreaming dale. Their bodies repose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Cobalt gas seeps into the nose and disarranges the mind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tongue, nail, and spleen were caked together then lacerated by heat to airy dots of dung.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gas molecules arrange along the ley lines of this plane to form an aeriform mesh. Objects on orthogonal trajectories are netted and shunted back toward their planar homes.

tag.Name: LevelEffectDescription
tag.Value: ▶astral tethering and damage versus extradimensional beings

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The synthetic mist called Golden Dawn ascends from its canister to atomize leafage and leave a clear view of the horizon in its wake.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Magenta showers the heterotrophs in a wet film that inhibits their absorption of dead animal and plant-things.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Minuscule hexagons of crushed glass, insect parts, and polyester film twinkle in the air like the ionized helium of star dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Brumes of spinning mold-dots make the air look fuzzy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Brumes of spinning mold-dots make the air look fuzzy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Brumes of spinning mold-dots make the air look fuzzy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Brumes of spinning mold-dots make the air look fuzzy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Hot air crests over an eddy and flares in the baking light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Air cracks under an eddy and blows supercooled moisture to sparkling dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Shining images of distant places and times project off the faces of a platonic prism-thing, and sound waves are pulled apart to the asymptote. The leylines are knotted here, and the illusion of locality crumples away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Shining images of distant places and times project off the faces of a platonic prism-thing, and sound waves are pulled apart to the asymptote. The leylines are knotted here, and the illusion of locality crumples away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A burning flame of amber floats below a psychic wick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Shadowing segments arrange along the ley lines of this plane to form a geometric mesh. Objects on orthogonal trajectories are netted and shunted back toward their planar homes.
